summary: Adds wooden longbow with ornaments and runes to the game (new mesh + new texture).
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ac7b3e][size=4][b]Faal Sizaan[/b][/size][/color]
(Ancient Nordic Longbow)


[b]    Description:[/b]

    Adds wooden longbow with ornaments and runes to the game (new mesh + new texture).

    It has all stats like Nord Hero Bow but the damage, which is like that of an Ebony Bow. This weapon can be upgraded as well (arcane smithing perk required) and has no any enchantments.

    You can find it in the depths of Forelhost (if you have no idea where these Nordic ruins are then just search www.uesp.net page for any info about its location).


[b]    Installation:[/b]

    » Copy FaalSizaan.bsa, and FaalSizaan.esp files to \"Skyrim\\Data\" folder
    (default path from Steam\'s main folder is: Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data).

    » In Skyrim Launcher choose \"Data Files\" and make sure that checkbox near FaalSizaan.esp is selected.

    » Start the game and load your any save - go to Forelhost Nordic Ruins to find it.
    And if you aren\'t of an adventurer type and want to obtain the bow quickly just execute in game\'s console the following command:

    startquest axRunicLongbowQuest

    and the bow shoud be added to your character\'s inventory.


[b]    Removal:[/b]

    » Delete the same files you copied previously during the installation proccess.


[b]    Known Issues / Compatibility:[/b]

    This mod adds only a new stuff. It doesn\'t overwrite or change anything from the original game thus incompatibility with other mods has been reduced to minimum.
author: Artisanix
